LanguageData.ROMA_Web.label: web
LanguageData.ROMA_Web.description: A silk spun web for catching prey.
LanguageData.ROMA_WebGiant.label: giant web
LanguageData.ROMA_WebGiant.description: A huge silk spun web for catching larger prey.
LanguageData.ROMA_Cocoon.label: cocoon
LanguageData.ROMA_Cocoon.description: A silk spun cocoon for holding subdued prey both alive or dead.
LanguageData.ROMA_CocoonGiant.label: large cocoon
LanguageData.ROMA_CocoonGiant.description: A huge silk spun web for holding larger prey.
